extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Murder! Mystery! Magic! A string of alarming murders streaks across the plane of Ravnica, and your players will step into the shoes of Ravnica's greatest detectives to track the clues and crack the case. Will they uncover the mastermind before it's too late?
If solving one case isn't enough for your players, there are even more puzzles to be solved, woven into the Murders at Karlov Manor products. Let your players put their detective skills to the test!
Play Boosters are the ideal booster for the play environment—especially Limited format events. Plus, they're a thrilling pack-opening experience, providing players the opportunity to snag multiple Rare cards or even a possible Booster Fun treatment.
Contents:
• 14 Magic: The Gathering cards
• 1 Token/Ad card, Suspect Punchout card, or Art Card. (Regular Art Card found in 30% of packs. Foil-stamped Signature Art Card in 5%.)
• Every pack includes a combination of 1–4 cards of rarity Rare or higher and 3–6 Uncommon, 6–9 Common, and 1 Land cards (Full-Art Land in 33% of packs). One card of any rarity is Traditional Foil. The Land card is also Traditional Foil in 20% of boosters.
• Rulebook not included.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Murder! Mystery! Magic! A string of alarming murders streaks across the plane of Ravnica, and your players will step into the shoes of Ravnica's greatest detectives to track the clues and crack the case. Will they uncover the mastermind before it's too late?
If solving one case isn't enough for your players, there are even more puzzles to be solved, woven into the Murders at Karlov Manor products. Let your players put their detective skills to the test!
Collector Boosters are the place for your players to chase down Ravnica's killer cards! Known as the shortcut to the coolest cards in the set, each Collector Booster is packed with foils and special treatments that are sure to add flair to any player's collection.
Contents:
• 1 Collector booster pack; 15 Magic: The Gathering cards per pack
• Collector Booster-exclusive special treatments and 10–12 Traditional Foil cards in every pack.
• 1 Traditional Foil double-sided token, with a combination of 5 cards of rarity Rare or higher, 3–5 Uncommon, 4–6 Common, and 1 Full-Art Land cards. Serialized Card in <1% of boosters.

results.name: Murders at Karlov Manor - Collector Booster Omega Pack

If solving one case isn't enough for your players, there are even more puzzles to be solved, woven into the Murders at Karlov Manor products. Let your players put their detective skills to the test!
Prerelease is your community’s first opportunity to get their hands on the newest Magic: The Gathering release and explore what the set has to offer, and Prerelease Packs are the perfect product to fuel the first events of this new set.
Contents:
• 6?Murders at Karlov Manor Play Boosters; each Play Booster contains 14?Magic?cards
• 1 foil, year-stamped Rare or Mythic Rare

• 1?Magic: The Gathering?Arena code card (only available in select regions)
• 1 deck box
